jump_scares.spoiler: The handcuffed patient lunges forward in the bed
A dog jumps at the car window and barks
Jack jumps at Bess to scare her
Amber suddenly slips into the hole and screams
A tree branch suddenly flies through the window and breaks it after Jack says “That’s why I come on when you least expect it.
After Paul says “I think there’s something in here” an animal jumps at him
An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo
SpongeJohn appears from the darkness
As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
The zombie suddenly gets up and growls at Anna
A bunch of zombies suddenly burst through the wall
After the end of a musical track, there is a sudden cut to Anna jumping out of a kiddie pool
A zombie lunges out from behind the christmas trees
After Chris closes the door there is a loud cut to Anna running through some plastic curtains
After the red ribbon flies across the screen a zombie santa appears behind it and jumps towards the camera
A spider crawls across Ashley’s foot
Luke fires a cork at the television
A phone rings
Ashley sees a lit up Santa outside
A hooded figured tackles Luke
Car lights turn on
The washing machine buzzes
Luke bursts through a door
Ashley is startled by a scary mask in the closet
A paint can swings down and narrowly misses Ricky
Garrett is suddenly shot
A sheep carcass comes down from the ceiling
The hanging sheep moves
A sheep hybrid comes out of the darkness
The cop is about to open the bag containing Chucky’s remains when his police radio blares into life
Tiffany suddenly attacks the cop as he looks into the bag
A spider lands on Damien while he is looking under the bed
There is a bolt of lightning and Chucky is suddenly sitting on the bed beside Tiffany
An apparently dead Tiffany suddenly jumps up from underneath the water in the bathtub
Warren, who was supposedly dead, suddenly jumps up out of the storage container
David knocks on the car window, startling Jade
Tiffany’s burnt face suddenly appears in the oven window
Tiffany bursts out of the oven and attacks Jade
Chucky hits Tiffany over the head with a spade
Tiffany suddenly springs to life and screams at the investigator
The bear appears in the foreground in the heavily zoomed shot, with a dramatic music chord
The phone in the foreground rings loudly, and Sari jumps up on the bed, startled by it
A sudden cut to a bear’s paw reaching for the lunch, with a dramatic music chord
A bear quickly runs across the frame in the background, accompanied by a scare chord
Peter is suddenly grabbed from behind and pulled back with force
After a few seconds of drawn out tension, the bear finally lunges towards the park ranger in the foreground with a roar
Just when Sari finally decides to step out from behind the tree, the bear’s paw suddenly smashes into it
The bear’s paw breaks through the glass and grabs the teenager’s head
A bloodied hand suddenly smashes against the window in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
After a long buildup of tension, a broom falls across the doorframe in front of the medic, startling him
The bear barges through the door in front of the medic
Zakk surprises Brodie
Rikki suddenly opens his eyes and attacks Zakk and Brodie
Terry, who is now possessed, appears beside Brodie in the bathroom
A bloodied hand bursts through Abigail’s chest
The face of Abigail, who is now possessed, pops up in front of Zakk and Brodie
Uncle Albert, who is now possessed, suddenly appears behind Brodie
An axe head hits the wall just beside Brodie
As Sloane hides in the apartment, suddenly the phone on the table rings
Sloane is pulled forward under the table
As Gwen walks through her apartment and passes the mirror again, you suddenly see the figure of a man. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Patrick is suddenly grabbed from behind
Patrick’s arguing with Sullivan. Suddenly, one of the soldiers standing around them is shot
Sloane and Melanie are talking. As Sloane turns around again, the doctor’s hand suddenly comes out of the bushes and grabs her
Patrick is looking for someone with the flashlight. When he turns around, there’s a man standing behind him. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Melanie runs with Sloane and Damon through the water in the cave. She grabs a rock and shines into a dark corner where suddenly a man is standing
After Damon says “Lets go” he is suddenly attacked by the doctor from the side
Sloane sees a double of her. After she says “I will never be you again”, the doctor attacks her
Patrick is suddenly attacked by Melanie with a knife
Sloane is attacked again by her double
Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
A creatures comes out of the orb and attacks his face
An axe goes through the door
A man hits the window of the door and begins yelling
Ass the light is turned on, Crawford charges forward with an axe
The fuse box catches fire
Roses’s car runs into a deer
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina can be seen walking past the hallway in the background of the shot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris spies Georgina looking out from a window in the house
Accompanied by a high pitch piano note, Georgina turns around and looks at Chris
During a tense scene, Chris closes a door to reveal Rose is watching him
After a long period of silence Chris suddenly runs at Dean and attacks him
As Chris goes to leave, Jeremy runs up and grabs him from behind
Chris drives into Georgina
The side mirror beside Chris is suddenly blown off by a gunshot
Accompanied by a sound effect, Chris turns to the side and sees Rose looking at him
A girl runs down a hallway and the strange easter-bunny creature jumps out at her
The creature roars suddenly
A woman grabs Kate’s arm while she is on the phone
A hand bursts out of Kate
The man sitting in the chair suddenly turns around to reveal a contorted face
After a few seconds of droning sounds as the camera zooms in on the saleswoman, there is a sudden clinking noise that causes her to flinch
Tom jumps out with a flashlight to scare Anne
Mrs. Fedder appears, yelling in the window
Beth wipes the window of the courier van to reveal the driver is dead
The Jack-In-A-Box suddenly opens
There is a loud bang
Tom and Howard burst through the door
A loud noise startles the group
Rosie and the Jack-In-A-Box fall through the ceiling
The demonic doll comes through the ceiling and attacks Howie
Elves burst into the living room
The silhouette of an elf appears at the car window, a few seconds later another elf comes through the broken windscreen
The demonic toys suddenly appear in front of the screen
The principal suddenly closes the blinds as Gary stares at Lucas
Karl startles Gary by putting his hand on Gary’s back
Gary closes the fridge door to reveal Lucas sitting on the kitchen table
When Gary looks back at the swing Lucas is gone (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Gary suddenly shines the torch into an empty room
One of the toys in Lucas’s room begins talking
Gary looks through a hole int he door and the goat puppet suddenly appears
Lila has a vision of the leprechaun in between the seats
A truck backs into some barrels
A bloody Ozzy is standing over Lila
Matt comes around the corner
There is a stuffed panda on the bed
Andy sneaks up and grabs Katie
The leprechaun jumps out in front of the closet
A rabbit knocks into a barrel
The store owner starts yelling “Whoa!” as an item is knocked over
A grotesque looking hand comes through the roof of Abby’s car
A patient opens his mouth to reveal his diseased tongue
A zombie breaks into El Wray’s truck
Carlos stands up and Hague is suddenly standing right behind him
A zombie bites Carlos on the arm as he goes to give Tolo his ring back
A car explodes
While feeding his wife some soup, Earl briefly looks away and when he looks back his wife has transformed into a zombie. [Video]
A burning man bumps into Dakota’s car
A crow bar slams into Dakota’s car window
An apparently dead J.T. suddenly sits up and points his gun at Hague
There is a single gun shot as Dakota walks towards the house
Block grabs Dakota by the hair
Zombies break into the restaurant
A zombie runs out of some bushes
A man reaches out to Daniel from behind after Daniel hides his brother in a closet
While kissing Alex, Grace looks up at the mirror and sees Aunt Helene watching them
As Grace peers out into the hallway, a hand suddenly grabs her around the mouth and pulls her back
As the maid calls out for Georgie, she is suddenly shot in the head
A maid is suddenly shot in the mouth with an arrow
Tony suddenly stands up and hits Alex over the head
Grace opens the elevator and sees a maid hiding in there
Grace picks up the torch and shines it on a goat
As Grace rests on the steering wheel, she looks up just as Stevens appears by the window
Various characters suddenly explode over the next couple of minutes
The cat jumps up at Dan’s face
The body suddenly jolts upwards and begins yelling
Megan’s father abruptly hits his head on the window behind Megan
A hand breaks through the door while Dan and Megan are talking
Ghostface suddenly opens the curtains in front of Drew
Ghostface taps Drew on the shoulder
Bobby startles Cindy as she looks out the window
A noise startles Cindy as she waits in her room for the police
Cindy opens the door and sees the Ghostface mask
Ghostface pops up behind Ray
Ghostface bursts through the wooden cabinet and attacks Cindy again
A screaming Cindy is suddenly run over by a car

movies.title: Scream 6
directors: Matt Bettinelli and Olpin Tyler Gillett

jump_scares.spoiler: After a moment of silence, children scream at a distance, startling Laura
Ghostface rushes from the shadows to stab Laura
Ghostface suddenly fires a random shot in the store
The music makes a loud sound when Ghostface turns around
The shape behind the window punches trough the glass to attack the psychiatrist
Right after Mindy says “run”, Quinn’s corpse burst out of her room
Accompanied by a sound effect, Mindy finds a dead man in her bathroom, shortly after, ghostface barges in the room
Just after the killer says “you’re not gonna be able to stop this” on the phone, Ghostface drops the body of Gale’s lover on the floor
Ethan touches Mindy’s shoulder with a clear lack of manner
A man with a ghostface costume jumps in front of the camera
The light flickers, then the killer appears in front of Mindy
Sam’s phone suddenly rings during a quiet scene
Ghostface stabs Tara
Ethan, back from the dead, runs into the room screaming
Ghostface quickly flashes on screen before the credits roll
Ghostface rushes trough the door
Ghostface appears in front of Christine
During a nightmare Sidney is having, Ghostface jumps up from behind a window and attacks her. [Video]
As a prank, Tyson scares Sarah
Sarah is startled by a Ghostface costume hanging on a rack
The bodyguard puts his hand on Gale’s shoulder
Ghostface appears behind the bodyguard
Jennifer startles Dewey and Gale, several seconds later they are startled again by Angelina and Tom
Ghostface pops out from behind a car
Jennifer yells out as Dewey and Gale go to kiss each other
A girl steps out of a caravan, startling the group
Jennifer surprises Gale
Ghostface appears at the window behind Sidney. [Video]
Ghostface opens a door inside the house
Dewey and Tyson bump into each other
Gale backs into Jennifer
Angelina bursts out of a door surprising Gale and Jennifer
Angelina turns a corner and runs into Ghostface
Ghostface suddenly appears, interrupting Dewey
Ghostface grabs Gale
Ghostface enters the room
Ghostface appears once more behind Sidney
Roman suddenly attacks Mark
Roman jumps up off the ground and runs at Sidney
A chair is thrown through the window
Casey looks in the window as a masked man turns around
Sidney peers out of the window as Billy pops up
A masked man comes out of the door behind Sidney
Billy climbs through the window
Sidney opens front door to Deputy Dewey holding the killer’s mask. [Video]
Principal Himbry closes the door revealing the masked man standing behind it
Gale turns around and almost runs into Deputy Dewey
Some tools fall down
Billy suddenly appears
The masked man grabs Sidney’s arm
Randy pops up beside Gale’s window
Kenny’s dead body slides off the roof onto the windscreen
The masked man pops up from the back-seat behind Sidney
Billy opens the door and Randy bursts in
Randy grabs Sidney while she is kneeling on the floor
Billy punches Randy
A dead looking Billy reaches out his hand suddenly
Sidney’s father falls out of the closet
While Tara’s typing, she’s startled by the phone suddenly ringing
Tara opens the front door and Ghostface is standing on the porch
Tara slowly backs away to a wall, and is startled by her phone ringing
Ghostface runs up to Tara from behind her back
Vince leans down to look inside his car. When he gets back up, Ghostface is standing right behind him
Sam leans back up from a sink and sees an apparition of Billy Loomis in the mirror
Ghostface slams a door shut behind Sam, revealing itself to be behind it
Sam turns around and runs into Richie
A car passes by in front of Sam’s car and honks loudly while she’s driving
Judy turns around and is startled when she runs into Wes
Ghostface jumps out from behind a plant on Judy’s front porch
Wes turns around and Ghostface is standing right in front of him
Tara’s phone suddenly begins to ring
Ghostface appears behind Richie while he’s standing in a doorway
Ghostface jumps at Dewey from the side while he’s running through the hallway
Amber closes the fridge door and Mindy is standing behind it
Chad turns around and Ghostface attacks him
Liv jumps down on the couch next to Mindy, startling her
Ghostface barges out of a closet behind Sidney
Sam jumps out of the closet at Richie
Amber runs into the room screaming
Ghostface quickly flashes on screen before the credits roll
Ghostface pops up at a window
Phil, wearing a Ghostface mask, scares Maureen
Phil is suddenly stabbed through the toilet cubicle wall by a man wearing a Ghostface mask
Dawnie comes up behind Cici, startling her
As Cici answers the ringing phone, Ghostface bursts into the room behind her
Sidney runs out of the house and is grabbed by Derek
Someone runs into Randy while trying to catch a football
Ghostface grabs Randy and drags him into the van
Cotton comes into view behind Sidney
Ghostface pops up behind Gale
Gale sees Ghostface on the other side of a window
Ghostface pops up in front of the windscreen when the cop car is stopped at a red light. [Video]
As Sidney attempts to remove the Ghostface mask from the killer she accidentally bumps the horn
Ghostface grabs Hallie around the neck
Gale bumps into Cotton
One of the stage props drops down behind Sidney
Mrs. Loomis jumps through the curtain and grabs Sidney
Gale’s hand reaches out of the fog as Sidney checks on Mrs. Loomis. [Video]
Mickey, who appears to be dead, suddenly leaps to his feet
A woman walking behind Cindy, Brenda, and Alex, is suddenly run over by a bus
Cindy is startled by Hanson as she enters the kitchen
The cat breaks a glass object startling Cindy and Buddy
The toy clown grabs Ray as he looks under the bed
A skeleton suddenly sits up in the furnace as Cindy sifts through the ashes
A door slams as Cindy and Buddy are talking
Cain rams Dwight’s wheelchair
A window blows out
The little girl suddenly turns around with blood all over her
Because Sissy is lost in her thoughts, she hits a kangaroo with the car
Sissy stares at the creepy painting and therefore gets scared by Alex coming in
Alex grabs the phone and looks around as she discovers the dead body of Jamie in the grass
Sissy starts hitting herself with her phone
After removing a few towels from under the bed, Emma finds Tracey’s corpse
While Emma is trying to process what happened, Sissy appears in the door behind her
Kyle jumps out from behind a couch to scare Lizzie
Lizzie puts her hand on Kyle’s shoulder while he is watching TV
Timothy suddenly appears in frame, chasing after Lizzie
Timothy’s hand appears in front of Mikey
A hand reaches out from underneath a car to grab a woman
A man’s face is suddenly engulfed in flames
A lady walks into another woman dressed in a Halloween costume
A lady leans back on the sofa to reveal Mary Bailey is sitting beside her
Over the next few seconds there are several sudden cuts to Bobbie (in red witch form) that may startle some viewers
Bobbie turns around to face Jack and her face morphs into the red witch
The killer bursts through the window
The previously dead girl suddenly sits up and screams
The girl bursts through the door
The “child” jumps out at one of the kidnappers

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down
A basketball hits Cole in the head as the title credits show on the screen
The camera pans around to reveal Bee watching Cole as he attempts to jump out the window
Cole backs into Sam’s corpse
Sonya slams her fist into some couragated iron near where Cole is hiding
Max is suddenly behind Cole
There is a loud sound effect as Cole bumps into something (but it’s only a potplant)
Alison grabs Cole around the leg
Alison is suddenly shot in the head (with gory results)
The car Max and her mother are in suddenly hits something and flips over
Billy comes into view, accompanied by a loud noise on the sound track
Billy appears behind a hiker and kills him. Seconds later, he appears behind a girl who he also kills
Duncan is suddenly impaled by the killer’s machete
The killer’s face appears in the window behind Gertie
Billy is suddenly standing behind Max, Nancy, and Chris
Max enters the barn and sees two dead bodies
Billy appears behind Max while she in untying Nancy
A ghost flies out of the ground and towards the camera
A hand suddenly appears out of the bathroom mirror
Magda’s ghost springs upwards behind Frank
Ray’s ghost suddenly runs into the room behind Lucy
Ray’s ghost drops onto Lucy’s car from above
Lucy moves away from the window to reveal Milton standing behind her
The ghost of Bartlett walks behind Lucy with a sound cue
Milton suddenly appears behind some wooden boards
Milton jumps out of the door behind Lucy
A woman is suddenly shot in the head after saying “that almost hit me”
There is a loud explosion after a man steps on a mine
A pig suddenly drops onto the ramp startling the group
Martin is suddenly shot in the head with bloody results
David attacks the security guard in the parking lot
Michael screams in horror as the brothers drop into the fog from the train bridge
The family dog attacks Michael when he enters the bathroom to kill Sam
Thor the dog lunges at Lucy
Edgar plunges a wooden spike through Marko’s heart
Paul leaps out from behind the bathroom door
Max turns around revealing he is a vampire
Grandpa drives his jeep into the house killing Max with a large wooden spike
One of the surfers shows its fangs and begins to screech
Nicole suddenly gets in front of Chris at a very fast speed and grabs him by the throat
As a camera shows an empty room through a window, Nicole appears from the side at extreme speed
While running, Evan bumps into one of the vampires
The barn door swings open
There is a sudden flash of light revealing one of the vampires reaching out to grab Evan
One of the vampires facing away from the camera quickly turns its head to reveal that it’s fully shifted into its true form
There is a sudden screech and Chris is dragged out of screen
A lightbulb suddenly explodes
Aunt Jillian suddenly swings the door open
A dog lunges at Leroy
Dust suddenly comes out of the grate that Fool is talking into
Fool is tackled from behind by a boy
Leroy, who is lying on the floor, jumps up as Fool touches him
Roach suddenly reaches through a gap in the wall and grabs Leroy
Daddy shoots through the wall beside Fool
The dog jumps up at the hole in the door
Daddy bursts into Alice’s room
Spikes come out of the wall just in front of Fool and Alice
Daddy, wearing his suit, jumps out at Fool. [Video
Mommy grabs Alice
Hands burst through the stairs
Several people come out of the walls and attack Mommy
With very little warning, Leatherface comes out of the record vault after Choptop points it out
Leatherface crashes through the door behind LG
Leatherface breaks through the wall behind Stretch
Sudden chainsaw noises up ahead startle Stretch
Leatherface bursts out of the tunnel in front of Stretch
Stretch is grabbed from above by Choptop
A farmer is pulled into the ground by an unseen entity
Val lifts a hat off the ground and Fred’s head is underneath it
The generator suddenly pops out of the ground
Jim is attacked by one of the snakes
There is a loud noise and the car begins to shake
A giant snake like creature comes out of the ground
A snake attacks the piece of wood Val is hitting the ground with
The giant snake surfaces just in front of a group of people
The pogo stick pops up out of the ground
The snake bursts through the floor of the store
Another snake bursts through the floor
A snake comes through the wall of Burt and Heather’s house
Nestor is dragged underground by one of the creatures
The building begins to cave in suddenly
One of the snake heads comes out of the water and screeches at Rhonda
The remaining snake bursts out of the ground in front of Val and Earl
Sheets blow upwards at a lady setting up Halloween decorations
Mr Wilkins is startled by noise and movement coming from a body bag
Billy jumps up from behind the table
A monster jumps from the swamp
Laurie spins around and comes face to face with a man dressed in a black costume
An egg is thrown at the old man’s window from outside
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
There is a very loud sudden cut from the protagonist staring at an animatronic, to a door opening
There is another loud and sudden cut to a fridge opening
The ostrich animatronic suddenly begins to shake violently accompanied by a sound cue
A door slams shut on its own
As the protagonist looks around a bathroom stall, an animatronic drops down from the ceiling right at the camera
As Liv is crawling around an airduct, an animatronic suddenly runs up behind her at a very quick speed
There is a cut to the siren animatronic running behind some trees accompanied by a sound cue
The siren animatronic jumps at Liv from the side
A knight animatronic suddenly stabs one of the teenagers
Kathy notes that one of the animatronics disappeared, and Bob responds “Where did it go?” after which the animatronic springs up behind them and attacks
An animatronic hand swoops down from the car window and grabs the police officer
The siren animatronic springs back to life as seen through a rear-view mirror
As the friends zoom in on the dead body on Google maps, the killer suddenly turns up and faces the camera
After a few seconds of silenty zooming in on the killer, a phone suddenly starts vibrating, scaring the group
The killer unexpectedly jumps out of a garbage can
The car’s back camera turns on to reveal the killer standing outside
The camera turns back on to reveal the killer now standing right in front of it
The killer jumps out from the back seat and grabs Phil
Fiona approaches a door curtain to peek at the other side and it’s suddenly pulled open
There is a sudden pounding on the door
A zombie lunges at the camera
A zombie attacks a man in the toilet
A zombie bursts out of a toilet door and lunges at Columbus
A zombie appears in the back seat of the car that Columbus is driving
Columbus has a vision of a clown crawling under the toilet cubicle door
Columbus wakes up on the couch and turns around to see his neighbour has turned into a zombie. [Video
The zombie neighbour reaches for the door-handle
A mechanical figure pops out at Columbus in the haunted house attraction
A zombie attacks Columbus from behind. [Video
A zombie runs at the man from the side of the room
Tallahassee suddenly slams the brakes, sending Madison flying forward
